job_details.Vacaturetitel: Software Developer Internship: wafer alignment applications
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Alignment Software Application Group is responsible of developing software applications on product wafer alignment domain at ASML. We create tools that helps our customers to optimize, monitor and diagnose wafer alignment process performed within Twinscan.

   Your Assignment

   You will be joining the Proact Team within the Software Development Group. Your task will be to:
     * Support in developing scripts that would improve daily work; such as scripts that would automate tasks that software developers are performing
     * Create a proof of concept Large Language Models (LLM) on premise and offline, where we collect, ingest documents; train the LLM with our custom information and be able to ask questions to documents, Become an intern at a Dutch company that's a global industry leader. You'll gain valuable experience in a highly innovative environment - one that sparks your imagination and creativity. In addition to a monthly internship allowance (plus a possible housing or travel allowance), you'll get practical guidance from experts in the field and the chance to work in and experience a dynamic team environment.
job_details.full_text:
Software Developer Internship: wafer alignment applications

Alignment Software Application Group is responsible of developing software applications on product wafer alignment domain at ASML. We create tools that helps our customers to optimize, monitor and diagnose wafer alignment process performed within Twinscan.

   Your Assignment

   You will be joining the Proact Team within the Software Development Group. Your task will be to:
     * Support in developing scripts that would improve daily work; such as scripts that would automate tasks that software developers are performing
     * Create a proof of concept Large Language Models (LLM) on premise and offline, where we collect, ingest documents; train the LLM with our custom information and be able to ask questions to documents, Become an intern at a Dutch company that's a global industry leader. You'll gain valuable experience in a highly innovative environment - one that sparks your imagination and creativity. In addition to a monthly internship allowance (plus a possible housing or travel allowance), you'll get practical guidance from experts in the field and the chance to work in and experience a dynamic team environment.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on developing scripts to automate tasks for software developers and creating a proof of concept for an on-premise LLM for document Q&A. While it mentions LLMs, the core tasks described lean towards scripting, automation, and proof-of-concept development rather than building production-grade generative AI applications or traditional ML models. The role is also framed as an internship with a focus on supporting daily work and gaining experience, which doesn't align with the core responsibilities of an ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer. The description lacks the depth and specific technical requirements typically associated with those specialized roles.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves developing scripts to automate tasks for software developers, which falls under software development practices.
job_tasks.phrase: Support in developing scripts that would improve daily work; such as scripts that would automate tasks that software developers are performing

job_tasks.justification: The creation of a proof of concept for an LLM, including training it with custom information, directly relates to the modeling aspect of generative AI.
job_tasks.phrase: Create a proof of concept Large Language Models (LLM) on premise and offline, where we collect, ingest documents; train the LLM with our custom information and be able to ask questions to documents

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions the context of 'product wafer alignment domain' and 'optimize, monitor and diagnose wafer alignment process', indicating a need to understand the business domain.
job_tasks.phrase: Alignment Software Application Group is responsible of developing software applications on product wafer alignment domain at ASML. We create tools that helps our customers to optimize, monitor and diagnose wafer alignment process performed within Twinscan.

soft_skills.phrase: Become an intern at a Dutch company that's a global industry leader. You'll gain valuable experience in a highly innovative environment - one that sparks your imagination and creativity.
practical guidance from experts in the field and the chance to work in and experience a dynamic team environment.
highly innovative environment - one that sparks your imagination and creativity.
